DataElement.preferredName: Child Integrated Fitness Assessment Description Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A son or daughter of any age, including biological offspring and sometimes including unborn children, adopted children, stepchildren, foster children and children born outside of marriage; person under an age specified by law._An assessment used to indicate a person's overall level of fitness, including tests used to assess a person's muscle strength, endurance, and flexibility._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something._The words of something written.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A son or daughter of any age, including biological offspring and sometimes including unborn children, adopted children, stepchildren, foster children and children born outside of marriage; person under an age specified by law.

Concepts.definition: An age group comprised of individuals who are not yet an adult. The specific cut-off age will vary by purpose.

Property.preferredDefinition: An assessment used to indicate a person's overall level of fitness, including tests used to assess a person's muscle strength, endurance, and flexibility.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
